mapper.select: SELECT IDX, TITLE, NAME, INIP, INDATE FROM BOARDTABLE ORDER BY IDX DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDTABLE (TITLE, NAME, CONTENT, PASSWORD, INIP, INDATE) VALUES(#{title}, #{name}, #{content}, #{password}, #{inip}, SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARDTABLE WHERE INDATE > NOW() - INTERVAL ${blockTime} MINUTE AND INIP = #{inip}
SELECT IDX, TITLE, CONTENT, NAME, INIP, INDATE FROM BOARDTABLE WHERE IDX = #{idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARDTABLE SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content} WHERE IDX = #{idx}
